metadata.name: The Circle of Life  #1/11
metadata.description:
"The Circle of Life" is a beautiful surreal digital image of an hourglass with a melting rose falling through it. 

The fragile rose serves as a painful reminder of the beauty and fragility of existence, conveying the passage of time and the transient aspect of life.

This image is full of meaning and invites profound thought about the ebb and flow of existence.
